{"id":295864487,"lang":"python3","time":"1 year, 5 months","timestamp":1579528944,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/295864487/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"N/A","code":"import sys\nsys.setrecursionlimit(100000)\n\nclass Solution:\n    def power(self, x, n):\n        if n==0:\n            return 1\n        if n%2==1:\n            return x * self.power(x, n//2) * self.power(x, n//2)\n        else:\n            return self.power(x, n//2) * self.power(x, n//2)\n    \n    def myPow(self, x, n):\n        if x==0:\n            return 0\n        res = self.power(x, abs(n))\n        if n < 0:\n            return 1/res\n        else:\n            return res","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n"}
